data.title: Latitude & Longitude
data.text:
Look-up

This page gives the latitude and longitude of various major cities around the world. The first column gives the latitude in degrees and minutes. The second column gives the longitude in degrees and minutes. If you are looking for a city that is not on this list, try here.
